sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Cows</radical>, using nothing more than <radical>towels</radical> and <radical>knives</radical>, have taken <kanji>control</kanji> of the world. Their <kanji>system</kanji> of control is brutal—payback for how us humans have treated them I guess.
meaningInfo: Imagine this new cow-controlled world—there are cows on every street corner, armed with towels and knives, intimidating all us humans into following their system.
readingMnemonic: It's time to take <kanji>control</kanji> back from the cows! Pull out your <reading>sa</reading>ber (<ja>せい</ja>) and fight back!
readingInfo: The cows' towels and knives won't stand a chance against your saber!
